result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
14CF397, 15CF328 and 15CF329.  Defendant David  Czapiewski in court, in custody with attorney Bradley J Jansen.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Victim compliance.  PQWOR filed and reviewed with DEF.  Charges/penalties reviewed.  Stip/Joint Recomm filed.  DEF will be pleading to CT 1 in 15CF329 - with all other cases and charges to be dismissed and read in.  DEF enters no contest plea.  Court finds factual basis and accepts plea.  Court finds plea was made FVKI and finds DEF guilty.  State heard/makes recomm on being consecutive sentence.  Atty Jansen heard/makes recomm.  DEF makes statement.  Court heard/follows the State's Recomm/orders:

24 Month IC - Consecutive
24 Month ES - Consecutive
Eligible for Challenge Incarceration
Not eligible for Substance Abuse Program
Court Costs to be paid as condition of probation

ADDRESS INFO for David Czapiewski
Current: P.O. Box 351, WCI, Waupun, WI 53963-0351 United States  (Effective: 06-22-2016)
Prior: 200 S. Madison Street, Waupun, WI 53963
Copy of notice of hearing for 9/13/16 plea/sent sent to Atty Jansen
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 13, 2016 at 11:30 am.

14CF397,15CF328 & 15CF329 - Defendant David  Czapiewski in court, in custody with attorney Bradley J Jansen.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Review of info is waived; not guilty plea entered; 30 days mtns; stc set; bail con't.  Def waives right to preliminary hearing in all 3 cases.  Atty Jansen states def may change plea to NGI, court advises must appear in person to do so.
Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.

14CF397, 15CF328, 15CF329: Defendant David Czapiewski in court, in custody with attorney Bradley J Jansen.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty.Jansen files Waiver for PH in 14CF397, Court reviews right to PH and notes Def. F&V waives right; Court has reviewed Atty. Rawski's previous report; discussion held; Atty. Jansen has not been formally appointed by SPD on 2 newer cases; State believes initial was done 1/15/16 (no bond set); Court will conduct Initial today on 15CF328 & 15CF329: Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. Court finds probable cause. Prelim requested waiving time limits. Court sets $1,000.00 PA Bond with conditions:  Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone. Court orders In Person STC/Poss. P&S; poss. PH on all cases 30 days out in Br. 3; 4/27/16 at 9am in Br. 3; Def. remanded

14CF397.  State of Wisconsin apprs by Atty Gib Thompson.  DEF, David Czapiewski apprs in person; in custody along with Atty Bradley Jansen.  DEF heard and state he is competent.  DEF heard and states he is competent.   Court finds based upon report Court finds DEF is competent.  Atty Thompson asks Court to also call 15CF328 and 15CF329.  15CF328 and 15CF329 - DEF enters not guilty pleas.  So ordered.  Court waives time limits.  Court sets ALL cases for prelim/possible plea and sentencing.  All cases to track with one another.
